text: Corneliu Vadim Tudor (; 28 November 1949 – 14 September 2015) was a Romanian politician. He was the leader of the Greater Romania Party (Partidul România Mare), poet, writer, journalist and a Member of the European Parliament. He was a Romanian Senator from 1992 to 2008. He died of a heart attack. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Politicians from Bucharest Category:MEPs for Romania
title: Corneliu Vadim Tudor
